description: Hit the slopes in confidence in their Snowboard Targeted Cushion Logo OTC Socks. Featuring their most advanced Indestructawool technology for enhanced durability, 4 Degree elite fit system for an unmatched performance fit, and a Virtually Seamless toe for top-notch comfort. Shred longer and harder with these technical snowboard socks in your corner.
name: Smartwool Snowboard Targeted Cushion Logo Over The Calf Socks - Mens
